page.title: 05W.D.MARK(Hides and Skins)LTD
page.content: Hides and sheepskins are bought(cattle hides Â£23-26, sheepskins Â£1-50-Â£7-50). They are then trimmed, weighed, salted and classified according to quality. A million and a half hides are processed every year. They are sold to tanneries and fellmongers. It is a contracting industry because people are eating less meat, due to cost and for health. E.E.C regulations recently meant that 40% of all tanneries had to close. {W.D.MARK}now employ 9 people. {GEOMECHANICS LTD. Foundation Engineers Underpinning buildings which are unsafe and piling to prepare ground for construction,also brickwork repair. A growing company which works in Norfolk, Suffolk, Lincolnshire, London and the home counties. The firm began 2\ years ago and now employs 10 office staff and about 30 on site.
